title: Nice interaction with sea animals
text: When we visited the manta was under maintenance, but we tried the electric eel. It’s amazing! The polar experience, dolphins show, orca show, and sea lions are hilarious. Sit in the wet area to enjoy the fun! Don’t miss the pink flamingos and the water ride!!!

title: Nice steak and yummy food
text: The food was great and the waiter was friendly. They serve you peanuts and yummy bread in the beginning as complimentary. You can even take peanuts with you when leaving for free. The beef in this place is tasty. One of the best places in Jeddah to eat steak and enjoy your meal.

title: Amazing view and food is nice
text: The breakfast combo plate was tasty. All the food was fresh and yummy. There were some nice twists in this plate. The waffle was bad. Chocolate syrup is not tasty at all. The food takes time to be served. They forgot one cafe latte we ordered! Overall it’s not worth your money. You have better breakfast choices in Jeddah.

title: A play with a great performance
text: This play keeps you wondering about the ending and the suspence is amazing while watching it. It is a must see when being in London.

title: Wonderful Musical
text: The musical is spectacular as well as the costumes of the actors. The live music and the huge theater are also amazing which makes it a whole new experience for me.

title: An Amazing Roman Bath
text: This place shows how advanced the Roman ages were. They were able to build such a place with a system for the water cycle. The place is amazing and there is a bus tour from London to the Roman Baths.

title: The best square to chill in Brussels
text: This square is amazing with all kinds of restaurants, belgian chocolate shops, and different place. It is great for a cup of coffee or lunch.

title: Amazing Zoo in London
text: This zoo has all animals that you might think of. It was my first time to see a lion, tiger, giraffe, kangaroo, cobra, and many other animals. This zoo is a nice experience and is divided in an amazing way.

title: Amazing stay
text: I booked in this hotel for Oktoberfest since it is 5 mins walk away from the square where Oktoberfest in held. I booked one bedroom with shared bath but they upgraded my stay to a one bedroom with private bath for no extra price. The room was so clean and the hotel had umbrellas to take since it was raining. The breakfast was amazing!

title: One of the best Museums in the World
text: This museum has different sections that describe the different cultures. It is huge and will take more than one day to check it all. One of the best places to visit in London.

title: Nice Zoo with lots of animals to see
text: This zoo has all animals that you might think of. It was my first time to see a lion, tiger, giraffe, kangaroo, cobra, and many other animals. This zoo is a nice experience and is divided in an amazing way.

title: The worst flight I had in years!!!!!
text:
My flight was from Paris to Jeddah passing by Ankara. The Airport in Ankara is the worst airport ever! The lounge is so small with a little variety of food. I had a layover of 10 hours and this was the worst layover. I make more than 20 flights a year. I'm an elite member on skyteam and this was my first flight with a star alliance member. Turkish Airlines made it the worst.

In Ankara airport, they didn't let us go to the lounge as we are transit passengers. They made us wait for two hours on unconfortable chairs without internet or anything. The people doesn't speak english or understand what we are saying. Turkish Airlines never interfered to ensure the comfort of its passengers!

Finally as I reached Jeddah, my baggage didn't arrive on the same day (August 26, 2018). My flight arrived 8:15 am and I waited till 11 am in the airport which made me lose my working day and make the driver wait for almost 4 hours! Finally they told us no more baggage will arrive and I filed a complaint about my lost baggage. This is the first time I lose a baggage with an Airline.

After couple of days, no one from Turkish Airlines called to update me on the baggage status. I was calling the Jeddah Airport team every now and then which were so helpful. Turkish Airlines team was not helpful at all! I was sending them feedback on their online forum without any helpful reply. I had some important stuff that was lost and needed to buy some items instead! At the end I called Turkish Airlines after almost two weeks and no one from their side called me, their reply was to wait and they are still investigating! I was clear with them and said the only thing I need is my baggage.
This is any passenger's right when he trusts the Airlines and travels from one place to another. He should arrive safely to the destination with the baggage on time without any damages! Turkish Airlines failed in the last part!
On September 11, 2018 which is after 16 days of baggage delay they finally said the baggage was lost. The claims department decided to compensate only 950$ knowing that since day one I provided the Airlines with a detailed list showing my lost items which totals to more than 5000$!
Turkish Airlines have the worst customer service, bad staff, unreliable team, and they made my flight a nightmare! I advise anyone who gets attracted by the low prices of Turkish Airlines to pay more and take another flight with a more reliable Airlines since losing his baggage will make you lose more money than what you save on a flight!

title: A confortable flight with great services
text: My flight was from Jeddah to Barcelona passing through Milan. I had a change of Airports in Milan. The Alitalia team is so helpful. A guide was waiting for me on the door of the plane to guide me how to change the airport from MXP to LIN. The experience was great and the Alitalia team and services are amazing.

title: A great itinerary with amazing price
text: I needed to travel to my homecountry Lebanon on Christmas so I was able to find this itinerary from JED to ATH in the early morning. I spend the day in Athens and then travel to BEY at the same day at 7 pm. The price was cheaper than the other direct flight and the flight arrives to BEY before it. The experience with Aegean was great and the baggage was received on time in Beirut knowing that a layover of more than 10 hours was in Athens.

title: Great ancient place in Athens
text: The acropolis is amazing and a must see in Athens if you are into history and cultural tourism. You can easily spend 4-5 hours there. The view from the Acropolis to Athens is breathtaking. It is a must see.

title: Great Airlines
text: My experience with Saudia was amazing. I had something urgent in Dubai and wanted to reschedule my flight for the nearest date and they were able to find for me a flight on the same night and confirmed the flight before 2 pm, so I had enough time to checkout and go to the airport. All of this happened through the phone and the payment was so smooth.

title: Nice Airlines with great prices
text: My flight was so confortable especially with the priority check-in, fast track security check, and priority boarding since I have skyteam elite membership. The Airlines is amazing. My baggage was received as priority in Hamburg. The experiance was amazing.

title: Best Planes and Awesome Seats
text: The KLM planes are amazing and so clean. The team is so friendly and the food is tasty. Since I have sky priority membership on Skyteam I was able to benifit from priority check-in, fast track security check, and priority boarding which made my flight much easier.

title: A Great Airline with good prices
text: Middle East Airlines is one of the best Airlines I traveled with up to now. The team is so nice. The service on the plane is great and the plane is clean. The food served is amazing especially the Kunafa in the morning! The on-board entertainment system is also good.

title: Nice Place to stay in barcelona
text: The hotel is close to Catalunya Square and a 10 mins walk to Las Ramblas i.e. the city center. The only problem was the small sized bed I got in the room knowing that the room was not cheap. Catalunya Square has several bus stations that can take you anywhere as well as a train station.

title: An amazing hotel with lots of facilities
text: This hotel is amazing. There is a bar on the 72nd floor and the breakfast is so good but a bit expensive. The rooms are huge with all kinds of facilities available. The location is not near Burj Khalifa or Dubai mall so you might need to take a cab to reach there.

title: A nice place to stay in Hamburg
text: The apartments are amazing and are 10 mins walk from the station. The airport is so close to this place. You can also take the train for 20-25 mins and you reach the center of Hamburg. Trains are operational 24/7 so no need to worry.

title: Nice Party in Milano
text: The place is amazing but the staff is rude. We arrived the first night and they refused to let us in. They said we should arrive before 11 pm. The next night we came again and we got in but the bar tenders were so rude. The place is nice and the music is amazing as well as the ambience. It is worth the try if you were in Milano.

title: Don't miss the visit to the dome. You have more than 700 stairs to reach up but it is totally worth it!
text: The line is always long but it moves so fast so don't worry about staying in queue. Within 20-30 mins you'll reach the cathedral.

title: Brunch a la francaise
text: Order the large cup of cafe creme with a croissant to dip it in. The omelette with the salad were amazing as well. The french bagette which is complementary is so yummy. A place to be in Paris.

title: Brunch not to be missed
text: The pancakes are so tasty especially the one with pistachio syrup and halawa! The shakshouka is also nice along with the other Arabic breakfast plates. It’s a must try for brunch.

title: Martin Solveig rocks!
text: The party and the venue are so nice! We partied till the morning hours. The place is a must see in Ibiza.

title: Party in the afternoon
text: The event took place near the pool. The place is so nice and the music is amazing. I surely recommend attending an event in Ushuaia if you are visiting Ibiza.

title: Carl Cox
text: The place is amazing to party till the morning! The music is deep bass as Carl Coxx always plays this kind of music.

title: A place with lots of fresh food
text: The mercat is an amazing place for food enthusiasts. There’s a lot of fresh food and fresh fruits you can eat on the go. The food is amazing in this market.

title: Best German Food
text: The beer is nice and the duck and pork medallion is so yummy with the cabbage salad and the potato ball. I recommend this place for traditional bavaria food.

title: Best meatloaf ever ate
text: The meatloaf in this place is so yummy with the sweet and sour sauce they serve. I tried the beer which was also so good. It’s a nice place for a sitting dinner in Amsterdam.

title: Best burger in Amsterdam
text: The burger was juicy, meat was so tasty, and the bread is fresh. The place is amazing and the people working there are so friendly. I recommend this as a place to visit if you are a burger fan.

title: Chill on the roof
text: The waiters were so annoying and didn’t visit the table unless we went and asked them to come take he order. The food is expensive and not that good. The view is amazing and the drinks. The place is a nice place to chill.

title: Sunday Funday is amazing!
text: We stayed in London for a week and didn’t know we had to reserve ahead of time for the Sunday Funday. We arrived around 1 at the place and the waitress was so friendly even though there were no places. She said she will try to find us a place within 30 mins. So we waited nearby and in less than 30 mins we got our place. The service and food are amazing! I recommend this place on a Sunday. The meat is amazing.

title: Brunch or lunch place
text: I tried this place as brunch in March 2017 with my friends and in May 2018 again visited it for lunch with my brother. The food is amazing. It is a self service place. But it’s worth every penny. The food is fresh and so tasty.

title: Tasty ribs and burgers
text: The place is so nice! We didn’t wait for a place to sit. We ordered most of the burgers on the menu and ribs to share. We were 7 persons. The food was tasty and I recommend it for meat lovers!

title: One of the best transportation services
text: The London underground is amazing. You can buy an oyster card and pay as you go. The only problem is that it closes @ 12 am. So by then you have to use the bus if you are partying late.

title: The best market in London
text: This place is a must be for the lovers of street food and to buy souvenirs. The shops are amazing and the food is so tasty. You can spend a full day in this market. It is a must see in London. Every time I visit London I have to pass by this market!

title: Flat iron steak at its best
text: The best flat iron steak I ever ate. It might even be the best steakhouse I ever ate at in my life. The place is amazing. The staff is so friendly. The salad and the steak are amazing.

title: An amazing place
text: The Montmartre visit this time was exceptional since I took the guided tours and they will let you visit some places in Montmartre and explain a lot about Dalida and other stories. In addition they take you the easy way up not climbing the long stairs. This was you can see some other sites on the way and get to Montmartre.

title: Lunch plat du jour
text: The best thing about this place for me was the view and the french wine rose. The food was okay. I should’ve ordered escargot, fois gras, or duck instead of chicken escalope. But for the price of almost 20 euros to get wine and main dish and salad and ice-cream, and considering this is in paris, the experience was so good.

title: Cathedral with a lot to say
text: The best way to discover this gem is to take a guide that will explain the engravings on the cathedral. There are lots of stories behind this place which makes it amazing! Make sure to ask or take a guide with you.

title: Brunch in Paris
text: I ordered the ham and cheese crepe at this place and it is so tasty! The best crepe you will ever eat. The cafe creme as well was so yummy and the crepe is big enough for one to be full after it.
